import { Delete } from '@material-ui/icons' import { color } from 'Assets/Style/themes' import CustomButton from 'Components/Button/CustomButton' import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Suspense } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { deletePostAction } from 'Store/actions/post.action' import './Post.scss' const Post = props => { const { tags, title, subTitle, description } = props const dispatch = useDispatch() const onDeletePost = () => { dispatch(deletePostAction(props._id)) } return ( Loading...}>
{tags}

{title}

{subTitle}

{description}

View Post props.onPostEditClick(props._id)}> Edit Post
) } export default Post
